short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Identify the Shopify theme used on a website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Shopify Theme Checker is a Chrome extension that allows users to quickly determine the theme a Shopify website is utilizing. With a simple click, the extension analyzes the active tab and returns the theme information in an easy-to-read format. Perfect for developers, designers, and e-commerce enthusiasts looking to discover the best Shopify themes!
